name: Candy Glaze Lip Gloss Stick
about: What it is: This jelly lip gloss stick provides the glassy shine of a gloss with the care of a balm. This non-sticky formula melts on lips for more moisturized, juicy looking lips...Formulation Type: Lipstick, Lip Gloss, and Lip Balm & Treatment..Benefits: Hydrating, Long-wearing..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid.- Vitamin E.- Mango Oils..What Else You Need to Know: Treat your lips to juicy color, glassy shine, and balmy hydrating care. Infused with hyaluronic acid, the formula locks in moisture for up to 12 hours and melts on lips for plumper, softer looking lips. This lip gloss leaves a sweet, subtle fragrance, encased in a click format for fresh comfort in each use.
ingredients: DIISOSTEARYL MALATE, BIS-BEHENYL/ISOSTEARYL/PHYTOSTERYL DIMER DILINOLEYL DIMER DILINOLEATE, PENTAERYTHRITYL ADIPATE/CAPRATE/CAPRYLATE/HEPTANOATE, VP/HEXADECENE COPOLYMER, PARAFFIN, OCTYLDODECANOL, CERA MICROCRISTALLINA / MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX / CIRE MICROCRISTALLINE, CI 45410 / RED 28 LAKE, SORBITAN SESQUIOLEATE, SYNTHETIC WAX , ALUMINA , DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, CI 15985 / YELLOW 6 LAKE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ETHYLENE/PROPYLENE COPOLYMER, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, DEXTRIN PALMITATE, TOCOPHEROL, MANGIFERA INDICA SEED OIL / MANGO SEED OIL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, AQUA / WATER / EAU, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, MANGIFERA INDICA FRUIT EXTRACT / MANGO FRUIT EXTRACT, PUNICA GRANATUM FRUIT EXTRACT
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Remove cap and turn the bottom of the Lip Gloss Stick six clicks for one application. Slowly glide along the lips to seamlessly glaze. Lip gloss can be retracted into the bullet after use to ensure freshness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
